title: On Pixel 5 how to copy ringtone media files in Google Files App to show in My Sounds for ringtones?
content: I see my ringtone files in Google Files App (the media files transferred from my old phone to new Pixel 5).  I cannot figure out how to get those files to appear in "My Sounds" in the Phone Ringtone screen of the Pixel 5 so that I can choose one of my personalized ringtones.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
